B2B.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used to refer to business activities between companies, especially using the Internet
B2B.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: business-to-business; B2B buying, selling, exchanging information etc is done between companies on the Internet, rather than between companies and customers
B2B.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: For more information about our B2B Marketing Services, call this number.
